title: Doctor Who: The Road to the Thirteenth Doctor #2: The Eleventh Doctor
description: The Eleventh Doctor and Alice visit 19th Century San Francisco, but there’s one problem – it’s full of robots! Do they come in peace? Or does their displacement in time signal something sinister?Plus, contains a serialised short from the team behind the new Thirteenth Doctor ongoing – Jody Houser, Rachael Stott and Enrica Angiolini.
author: James Peaty
